Topic.Title: So I take it nobody cares about the recipe being discovered and sold on Ebay

Message.Msg: Yeah that's a real knee slapper. Explain to me then why it hasn't been listed again. All I can say is "Good Luck" and I will go one step farther expect to see a copy of it hitting a store near you very soon!

Message.Title: Its the blueberry not the coconut stupid??
Message.Msg: LBIX is the small company ko and pep cannt catch stupid??

Message.Title: MISM looks prime for a huge breakout
Message.Msg: Keep an eye on MSIM, A little birdie told me that this thing is about to get a huge awarness campaign.

Message.Title: Bebida Beverage
Message.Msg: The next Coca-Cola. BBDA is gong into over 660 retail stores including 380 Barnes and Nobles. It has a huge profit margin and revenues are being shot out of a cannon right now. Check it out. Only 3/10ths of a penny per share.
